pages.text: The $(d)Water Walking Boots$() allow you to $(3)walk on water$() when worn.$(br2)They do not work while sneaking, or when you're already under water.$(br2)Do note that being able to $(o)stand$() on water means you're also able to $(c)land$() on it as well!
pages.title: Water Walking Boots

pages.text: The $(d)Obsidian Water Walking Boots$() combines the effects of the Water Walking Boots and the $(l:items/obsidian_skull)Obsidian Skull$(/l).$(br2)Get it by combining the two in an Anvil.$(br2)Remember that the Obsidian Skull does $(c)not let you walk on lava$()! For that, you'll need the $(l:items/lava_waders)Lava Waders$(/l).
pages.title: Obsidian Water Walking Boots
